text:
7 hot Russian TV shows of 2019. Need to watch
01 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Mikk Cid
Domestic series come out with enviable regularity, and some turn out to be very suitable.
I collected for you the most watchable projects that are sure to like and help you survive this November weekend.
Enjoy:
Cipher
Genre: Drama, Detective Director: Vera Storozheva Cast: Maryana Spivak, Ekaterina Vilkova, Yana Osipova
About what: a detective story about GRU agents in skirts.



Four women retired secret service agents are returning to service to identify traitors to the motherland, spies and other intelligent pests.
Each of the heroines has one talent: excellent memory, logical mindset and others. Together they have to work for the benefit of the USSR undercover, remaining ordinary housewives in everyday life.
Search for a show on Google
Five minutes of silence. Return
Genre: Drama Director: Igor Draka, Guzel Kireeva Cast: Roman Kurtsyn, Igor Lifanov, Oleg Andreev
About what: stories of saving people by the Ministry of Emergencies.



Heroic everyday life of the fighters of the search and rescue squad of the Ministry of Emergencies in Karelia. Every day, risking their lives, they save the lives of others.
The new season is much more dynamic than the first: the camera work is excellent, the stories are interesting, and the actors are charismatic. Plus, there is a love line that doesn‚Äôt particularly annoying and does not interfere with the main idea of the series. You can watch.
Search for a show on Google
Tell me the truth
Genre: Drama, Detective Director: Andrei Eshpay Cast: Victoria Isakova, Aglaya Shilovskaya, Pavel Trubiner
About what: about marriage, suspicions and problems between a man and a woman.



After fifteen years of marriage, the heroine begins to suspect her husband of treason, and tries to get to the truth in all ways.
Gradually, the methods are becoming more sophisticated, personal life is crumbling, as well as a career. The main thing - it is not clear what awaits both spouses in the end - a confirmation of fidelity, or a family split.
Search for a show on Google
Shadow behind
Genre: Drama, Detective, Thriller Director: Mark Gorobets Cast: Ivan Oganesyan, Alexander Lyapin, Karina Andolenko
About what: the investigation of mysterious murders in a small town.



In a provincial town, a series of similar murders takes place: women disappear when they return from parties.
In order to deal with a mysterious maniac, the capital‚Äôs investigator from the Prosecutor General‚Äôs Office comes to the city, who is given to assist the young investigator Svetlana Miroshnikova and the completely ‚Äúgreen‚Äù investigator Mikhail Vorobyov.
Search for a show on Google
Sect
Genre: Drama, Mystery, Thriller Director: Gela Babluani Cast: Svetlana Khodchenkova, Evgeni Koryakovsky, Philip Yankovsky, Anastasia Chistyakova
About what: the tense story of saving a religious fan from the clutches of a sect.



Deprogrammers are specialists in bringing people out of cults. Heroes receive an order for release from under the influence of one sect girls Nicky, ex-models, stars of commercials.
The methods of deprogrammers are extremely tough - on the verge of psychological and even physical violence. But plans begin to burst at the seams when the powerful leader of the sect declares a real war for them and is ready for anything in order not to give Nick.
Search for a show on Google
Polar
Genre: Comedy Director: Mikhail Starchak, Konstantin Statsky Cast: Mikhail Porechenkov, Ivan Okhlobystin, Katerina Shpitsa, Vladimir Epifantsev
About what: a funny story about bandits, offshore and a forgotten password.



The main character is a formidable gangster from the 90s who has retired and lives on his own, not messing with crime.
Once, his former "buddies" asked for help: to hold on their accounts a large amount of money, the so-called common fund. After some time, the bandits asked to return the money, but the trouble is: the horseshoe fell on the hero‚Äôs head and he completely forgot the password for the account with millions.
Search for a show on Google
Beetles
Genre: comedy Director: Konstantin Smirnov Cast: Vyacheslav Chepurchenko, Pavel Komarov, Vadim Dubrovin
About what: the harsh everyday life of programmers, in whom everything is going wrong.



Three friends created a unique smartphone application that a serious corporation became interested in. In the process of discussing the multi-million dollar sale, friends suddenly come from the military enlistment office: time to repay the debt to the motherland.
The guys choose an alternative service in the remote village of Zhuki, where they will try to finish their project. Just not so easy to develop an application where there is not even the Internet.
